cards.title: World of Anterra
cards.text: Skyrim with pixel art. Influenced by classic and modern games, World of Anterra is an innovative, open world roleplaying game.
cards.creator: By 81monkeys
cards.desc: Inspired by modern and classic games, World of Anterra is a highly interactive, nonlinear, open world RPG. The game features an endlessly explorable open world, deep progression systems, fast paced combat, and rich lore, all wrapped in a satisfying and accessible interface. It‚Äôs the type of game only an independent studio could make!

cards.title: Star Stuff-ies
cards.text: Cuddle the constellations with a zodiac-inspired stuffed toy.
cards.creator: Emily Fischer

cards.title: Bleeding Edges: The Art of Danni Shinya Luo
cards.text: A 120-page deluxe hardcover featuring the art of Danni Shinya Luo, echoing the idea of ‚Äúbleeding edges‚Äù through watercolor blooms.
cards.creator: By Rocketship

cards.title: Company of the Eagle #1-3 ‚Äî A Harrowing Anticolonial Fantasy
cards.text: The Lord of the Rings meets The Last of the Mohicans in a 35 page anticolonial, flintlock fantasy comic.
cards.creator: By John J. Perez

cards.title: NASA Automatic Watch Can Withstand 100 Earth Atmospheres
cards.text: NASA Automatic Watch Can Withstand 100 Earth Atmospheres üöÄ Commemorating the farthest human-made object in space, the individually numbered Voyager Automatic Deep Space Diver can go anywhere
cards.creator: By Xeric

cards.title: TEMUDJIN by Ozanam and Carrion
cards.text: A gallery-sized fantasy graphic novel about a man who could be the reborn Genghis Khan lushly illustrated by Antoine Carrion.
cards.creator: By Neurobellum Productions

splitscreendata.title: Ready to make magic?
splitscreendata.body: This October, take part in Witchstarter, our first open call for Magic & Divination projects. To participate, launch a project in the theme of magic and the occult, or discover new favorites to pledge to. Deck or dice, book or board game, ideas for Witchstarter campaigns can span any category on Kickstarter.

splitscreendata.title: Bring an RPG zine to life
splitscreendata.body: Our annual Zine Quest open call bestows creators with a valiant mission: Bring your RPG to life with maps, adventures, monsters, comics, articles, and interviews! Discover projects inspired by old-school tabletop RPGs, like early D&D.

splitscreendata.title: Meet Kickstarter‚Äôs Community Advisory Council
splitscreendata.body: The Kickstarter Community Advisory Council will offer insight across a range of creative disciplines and help us identify issues, questions, and opportunities we may not be able to see on our own.

splitscreendata.title: Kickstarter‚Äôs 2021 Public Benefit Statement
splitscreendata.body: Nearly 3.2 million people pledged more than $800 million to Kickstarter creators in 2021. Our latest annual Public Benefit Statement reports on how well we lived up to our commitments as a Public Benefit Corporation and fulfilled our mission to bring creative projects to life.

splitscreendata.title: Magic & Divination
splitscreendata.body: From terrific tarot decks and wizarding wands to arcane accessories, eldritch electronics, sorcerous stationery, and so much more, you can now find all the most spellbinding projects here in one place.

splitscreendata.title: How to Create a Great Kickstarter Publishing Project Page
splitscreendata.body: Discover tips and tricks for each element of your campaign, from choosing your funding goal to lining up creative rewards.

cards2.title: A Steampunk Carol: A Festive Nutcracker Retelling
cards2.text: An 86+ page steampunk-infused graphic novel celebrating The Nutcracker and Mouse King in a special retelling of the classic tale.
cards2.creator: By Brant Fowler
cards2.desc: Inspired by modern and classic games, World of Anterra is a highly interactive, nonlinear, open world RPG. The game features an endlessly explorable open world, deep progression systems, fast paced combat, and rich lore, all wrapped in a satisfying and accessible interface. It‚Äôs the type of game only an independent studio could make!

cards2.title: Wizards & Relics Awakening - A Magical Card Game
cards2.text: An exciting standalone expansion set to the magical dueling card game Wizards & Relics!
cards2.creator: By Mike Bregel

cards2.title: Sea of Legends: Vengeance of the Empires
cards2.text: A new expansion for Sea of Legends along with a reprint of the original and expansion.
cards2.creator: By Zach Weisman

cards2.title: Reviving a critically-acclaimed but forgotten American novel
cards2.text: Publishing a new edition of B. H. Friedman's brilliant 1964 novel YARBOROUGH.
cards2.creator: By Rick Schober

cards2.title: Solidteknics Kitchen Tools - Lil Flippa & TSS!
cards2.text: 100% Made in Australia. Versatile cooking tools in both Stainless & Titanium! Built to last generations.
cards2.creator: By Rebecca Ramsay

cards2.title: Doomensions: Pop-Up Mystery Manor
cards2.text: Solve an immersive, 3D pop-up escape room in a box! From the devious minds behind Curious Correspondence and Mysterious Package Company
cards2.creator: By Curious Correspondence
